# Wrap + written summary template

## During the wrap (live)
- "Let me summarize what we have so far — stop me if I misrepresent anything."
- Write it down together (you type while you talk).

## Snapshot
- Key drivers & Engagement sources
- Operating parameters (Timeline/Bandwidth/Location)
- Risk profile & Constraints

## Promising directions (3–6)
**Direction name (1 sentence)**

- Why it might fit (1–2 bullets)
- Next steps (1–2 low-cost steps)
- Resources / links to support the next steps (as needed)

## People to talk to / intros (if any)

## Door open
- "If questions come up after you digest this, feel free to message."
- Optional: "If it would help, we can do a check-in later."
